ygData.subject: Re: Bard petition ideas (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: The only reason I feel that way, is because my name is after Thom Merrilin, a character in the novels of Robert Jordan. He used to be a court Bard in the
ygData.messageBody:
The only reason I feel that way, is because my name is after Thom Merrilin,
a character in the novels of Robert Jordan.
He used to be a court Bard in the palace of Andor but was exiled into
becoming a travelling gleeman. He has more knives hidden on his person than
you can count, and is a rough, tough, street smartish person.

Gleeman, Bard of the 15th Chorus - Karana
Long Live the StarGazers!
-----Original Message-----
From: silky@... <silky@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, August 07, 1999 5:11 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard petition ideas (Long)


>From: silky@...
>
>
>Give me a noncombatant role any day of the week.
>
>I think overall as a class - MOST bards - at least those well suited to the
>role have matured past having to be the center of attention and HERO of the
>day.
>
>
>
>At 05:04 PM 8/7/99 -0600, you wrote:
>>From: "Sean Gifford" <Giffords@...>
>>
>>Would you rather be a poor little pansy strumming his/her lute on the
street
>>corner of some slum, or being a Blade swinging cuisiniart slaying big ugly
>>orcs and whatnot???
>>
>>Gleeman, Half Elven Bard of the 15th Chorus
>>EQ is a drug, and I need a fix
>
>
